title: How to remove a credit card from your PS4, and edit or add other cards to make purchases from the PlayStation Store
text:
It's easy to remove a credit card from your PS4 if you no longer want to store your information to make purchases.

You can add up to three credit cards on a PS4, and change which one is the default payment at any time.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Connecting your credit card to your PS4 account is essential if you want to make purchases in the PlayStation Store on your console.

You can use the Settings menu on your PS4 to add, remove, and modify your credit card information.

Here's how to do it.

Check out the products mentioned in this article:

How to add a credit card on your PS4

1. Using the controller, select "Settings" on your PS4.

2. Select "Account Management."

You can manage your PS4's credit card info in the Settings menu under Account Management. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

3. Select "Account Information."

4. Select "Wallet" and then select "Payment Methods."

The Wallet holds your credit cards and PayPal information. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

5. If you already have a payment method on your PS4, you'll need to enter your password. Otherwise, you can proceed directly to selecting the type of payment method you want to use, such as "Add a Credit/Debit Card" or "Add a PayPal Account," and follow the instructions to enter the payment details.

You can make purchases on your PS4 using PayPal, a credit card, or debit card. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

How to remove or edit a credit card on your PS4

1. Using the controller, select "Settings" on your PS4.

2. Select "Account Management."

3. Select "Account Information."

4. Select "Wallet" and then select "Payment Methods," then enter your PS4 password.

If you have more than one payment option on your PS4, you can choose which one you want to edit or remove. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

5. Select a credit card and then do one of the following:

If you have more than one card connected to your account and want to change the default used for payments, select "Set as Default" and confirm your choice.

If you want to modify the details of your credit card, select "Edit Card Information" and follow the instructions to change the card details.

If you want to remove the card completely, select "Delete" and then select "Yes" to confirm.

After selecting a credit card, you can make it the default payment method (if it isn't already the default), edit, or delete it. Dave Johnson/Business Insider
